general.name: Gjin Rexhaj
general.headline: Aspiring Developer
about: My name is Gjin Rexhaj, and I am a third-year university student. I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science; Majoring in Computer Science and minoring in Mathematics.
I'm a passionate developer whose interest and experience spans across multiple different subsets within CS. Follow me on GitHub!

experiences.title: Undergraduate Research
experiences.description: Working under the mentorship of a professor. Tasked with designing a convolutional neural network to scan and determine benign vs malignant tumors given an MRI scan of the prostate.

experiences.title: Coding Instructor
experiences.description: Working as an instructor tasked with mentoring and teaching students fundamental programming concepts via project-based learning.

experiences.title: Firmware Engineer Intern
experiences.description: Multi-faceted role which dealt with IoT solutions research and testing, and developing algorithms for radar sensor vector stabilization.

education.title: Bachelor of Science; Major in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics
education.description: Honors program member, ASU treasurer, CS club member, ASME attendee, chairperson and honors program scholarship recpient. GPA: 3.8 / 4.0

volunteering.title: Engineering Colloquia Series Presentation
volunteering.description: Gave a presentation under mentorship of a researcher at a University. The presentation introduced and explained Agentic AI, and multi-agent AI systems to a broad audience of academic scholars.

volunteering.title: Aircraft Technician | Volunteer Work
volunteering.description: Workload dealt with the ordering, assembly, and installation of wiring harnesses and advanced avionics systems for small form-factor propeller engine aircraft.

projects.name: java-neural-network
projects.description: An open-source neural network engine and frontend GUI implemented in pure Java

projects.name: Graphing Calculator
projects.description: A Python GUI application created with PySide6 and matplotlib which graphs user-specified arbitrary mathematical functions on a two-dimensional cartesian plane

projects.name: Fractal Generator
projects.description: A Java GUI program created with Swing and AWT which renders an "nth" order Sierpinski fractal.

projects.name: opengl-renderer
projects.description: An OpenGL renderer written in C++ with an intermediate-mode docking interface.
